item.title: Make npcs talk like people with autotalkers do
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

What’s the npc id you want to talk? Go in NpcHandler.java and find

if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo"; } }

Under that put

					[code]if (npcs[i].npcType == NpcId) {
					if (misc.random2(22) == 20) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Hi! I'm a talking NPC!";
					}
				}[/code]

Hi! I’m a talking NPC! = What you want them to say there.
NpcId = Which npc id you want to talk.

Read full topic
item.source: Make npcs talk like people with autotalkers do
